comment:
* A utility class for issuing XML error messages.
 * @xsl.usage internal

variables.name: BAD_CODE
variables.comment: String to use if a bad message code is used.

variables.name: FORMAT_FAILED
variables.comment: String to use if the message format operation failed.

methods.name: public void setLocale(Locale locale)
methods.comment:
* Set the Locale object to use.
   * 
   * @param locale non-null reference to Locale object.

methods.name: public Locale getLocale()
methods.comment:
* Get the Locale object that is being used.
   * 
   * @return non-null reference to Locale object.

methods.name: public static final String createXMLMessage(String msgKey, Object[] args)
methods.comment:
* Creates a message from the specified key and replacement
   * arguments, localized to the given locale.
   *
   * @param msgKey    The key for the message text.
   * @param args      The arguments to be used as replacement text
   *                  in the message created.
   *
   * @return The formatted message string.

methods.name: public static final String createMsg(ListResourceBundle fResourceBundle, String msgKey, Object[] args)
methods.comment:
* Creates a message from the specified key and replacement
   * arguments, localized to the given locale.
   *
   * @param fResourceBundle The resource bundle to use.
   * @param msgKey  The message key to use.
   * @param args      The arguments to be used as replacement text
   *                  in the message created.
   *
   * @return The formatted message string.

methodNames: public static final String createXMLMessage(String msgKey, Object[] args)
public static final String createMsg(ListResourceBundle fResourceBundle, String msgKey, Object[] args)
